name: Product Dispenser for Voguepay Payment Gateway
author: Ojosipe Ayomikun

sections.description:
Before you start accepting payment on your site,Sign up and login to your Voguepay Account go to Menu, Business Solutions then Product Management, then Create product category submit. finally copy Product code.to use as shortcode on this plugin It is very important that you do this before you start using this plugin.

A Simple wordpress payment plugin for selling pins e.g Recharge Cards, Jamb Scratch Cards e.t.c.

Usage: Use a shortcode tag in your wordpress page or articles to add the button on your wordpress page

[voguepay item=”scratch card” code=”8979770a667″]

Voguepay is a Nigerian Payment Gateway

Voguepay is a unique online payment processor offering a secure and easy-to-use means of transacting business online.

VoguePay allows site owners to recieve payment for their goods and services on their website with zero setup fee.

To signup for Voguepay visit here

With this plugin, you will be able to accept the following payment methods selling your product:

  • MasterCard
  • Visa Card
  • Verve Card

Note

This plugin is a tunnel to your merchant product store created on voguepay.

Plugin Features

  • __Choose between enabling multiple quantity .
  • __Use Shotcode to link button to your product category on Voguepay.
  • __Option to use customise Pay now button image

Suggestions / Feature Request

If you have suggestions or a new feature request, feel free to get in touch with me via email here

You can also follow me on Twitter! (http://twitter.com/ojosipeayo)

Contribute

To contribute to this plugin feel free to fork it on GitHub Voguepay Pin Product on GitHub
sections.faq:
What Do I Need To Use The Plugin

  1. You need to have a WordPress CMS site.
  2. You need to open an account on Voguepay and setup a merchant product store

short_description: Vogue Pin Dispenser allows you sell dispensable Product such as card pins and accept payment on your Wordpress blog,page,article  via Visa Card, Maste …
